name: MinEd Text Editor

screenshots.caption: Pick list of a CJK input method
Displaying Unicode and open pop-up menu
Separated display of combining characters and open flag menu
Mined in xterm with nice 10x20 font and generated 20x20 font
Mined with scrolling pull-down menu and HTML highlighting

short_description: Text editor with extensive Unicode and CJK support. Convenient and efficient features for editing of plain text documents, programs, HTML etc. User-friendly interface, mouse control and menus. Runs in a text-mode environment like xterm or mintty.
